name: in the face of
example_en: She remained calm in the face of danger.
example_cn: 她在危险面前保持冷静。
word_family: face (n. 脸，面), face up to (面对，正视), face the music (承担后果)
memory_tips: 词源：'face' 来自拉丁语 'facies'，意为‘脸’或‘表面’。记忆技巧：想象一个人站在困难面前，直视它，不退缩。联想记忆：将‘face’与‘面对’联系起来，想象自己在镜子前面对自己的挑战。

image_prompt.main_image: A person standing confidently in front of a large, intimidating obstacle, such as a towering wall or a stormy sea, symbolizing facing challenges head-on.
image_prompt.example_image: A woman standing calmly in a dark forest with wild animals around her, representing staying composed in the face of danger.

collocations: in the face of danger (面对危险); in the face of adversity (面对逆境); in the face of criticism (面对批评)
